name: Untitled BioPunk Strategy Game
description:
Note: Requires a controller to play (tested with an Xbox 360 controller specifically).

-----------------------------------About---------------------------------------

This is the senior project of four students from UCI. It is a tile-based strategy game set in a BioPunk future. It features a functional drafting system, a cast of diverse  units, traversable maps, combat mechanics, and more. The game is still in the works and should be done in the next few months. However, it is currently in a playable state, and is just not completely balanced or feature complete at this time. 

-------------------------------How to Play------------------------------------

Left Stick: Move the cursor

Right Bumper: Cycle between moveable units

A Button: Select/Move unit

B Button: Deselect current unit

---------------------------------Creators-------------------------------------

Christophe Saucier - Art(Head)/Programming/Design

Jared Chun - Programming(Head)/Production/Design

Marlon Valladares - Design(Head)/Programming

Duncan Wycliff - Sound(Head)
